snippet.title: Chuck Norris: Bring on the Pain! in game trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on the App Store: http://itunes.apple.com/app/chuck-norris-bring-on-the-pain/id334688738?mt=8

Check out the official Chuck Norris Fact Book with the best facts handpicked by Chuck Norris himself. http://tiny.cc/chuckbook. 

Chuck Norris doesn't cheat death; he wins fair and square! 

Get your chance to save the day and incarnate the greatest american who ever lived soon on your iPhone and iPod touch ONLY for 0.99$

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
